Player History
Released by Capital City on 11/2/1990...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/5/1991 to a 3-year deal worth $1,500,000 per year...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/3/1991, off Richard Rhames (DIA)...
Won World Championship with Pittsburgh in 1991...
Won Outstanding Newcomer Award in 1991, hitting .272 with 8 HR, 42 RBI...
